title: 有木有dalao救我啊
author: 苏小落
txt_content:
minecraft1.12.2只要进入存档后打开物品栏或者暂停就会闪退貌似是jei的问题，有木有方法解决啊错误代码如下：

[07:35:15] [main/ERROR]: Exception loading model for variant flammpfeil.slashblade:material#type=none, blockstate location exception: 
[07:35:32] [main/ERROR]: Error thrown whilst accessing JEI internals!
[07:35:32] [main/ERROR]: Error thrown whilst accessing JEI internals!
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: Exception caught during firing event net.minecraftforge.client.event.GuiScreenEvent$KeyboardInputEvent$Pre@1ef918ce:
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: Index: 3 Listeners:
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: 0: HIGHEST
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: 1: ASM: codechicken.nei.handler.NEIClientEventHandler@67646076 onKeyTypedPre(Lnet/minecraftforge/client/event/GuiScreenEvent$KeyboardInputEvent$Pre;)V
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: 2: NORMAL
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: 3: ASM: class org.cfpa.i18nupdatemod.report.ReportKey onKeyPress(Lnet/minecraftforge/client/event/GuiScreenEvent$KeyboardInputEvent$Pre;)V
[07:35:33] [main/ERROR]: 4: ASM: mezz.jei.input.InputHandler@55f2a973 onGuiKeyboardEvent(Lnet/minecraftforge/client/event/GuiScreenEvent$KeyboardInputEvent$Pre;)V
[07:35:36] [main/FATAL]: Reported exception thrown!
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.author: sukonun
replies.txt_content: jei 抛出异常 请检查 ，有JEI 了那你: codechicken.nei.handler.NEIClientEventHandler又什么鬼

replies.author: 苏小落
replies.txt_content:
sukonun 发表于 2019-3-21 10:39
jei 抛出异常 请检查 ，有JEI 了那你: codechicken.nei.handler.NEIClientEventHandler又什么鬼 ...
1.12.2的jei不是nei的前置咩

replies.author: sukonun
replies.txt_content:
苏小落 发表于 2019-3-21 11:57
1.12.2的jei不是nei的前置咩
jei  可是只有一个前置啊，是不是加了别的

replies.author: 苏小落
replies.txt_content:
sukonun 发表于 2019-3-21 12:59
jei  可是只有一个前置啊，是不是加了别的
没有诶，我只用jei也这样

replies.author: 森林蝙蝠
replies.txt_content:
第一，1.12的JEI没有前置；
第二，你的物品栏里有拔刀才导致的崩溃。

replies.author: 苏小落
replies.txt_content: 找到原因了。。。加了个汉化mod崩溃的= =
